metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2961 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s PLP Rosefunctionality in the way a user triggers a race condition by calling bindwhile simultaneously triggering the rose_bind() function. This flaw allowsa local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on thesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
